Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Biter \Bit"er\, n. 1. One who, or that which, bites; that which bites often, or is inclined to bite, as a dog or fish. ``Great barkers are no biters.'' --Camden. [1913 Webster]
2. One who cheats; a sharper. [Colloq.] --Spectator. [1913 Webster]
